configurationArguments.criteria: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.EMAIL" Operator="IsNotNull" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Practice & Community Nurse]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.ACCOUNT_STATUS_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Active]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
